channel.title: 'thread 4' error
channel.description:
[code]Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Welcome to busterscape Base Credits to buster for base
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 439 at Class30_Sub2_Sub2.method421(Class30_Sub2_Sub2.java:322) at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:224) at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:132) at Class46.method581(Class46.java:224) at Class46.method578(Class46.java:141) at Class7.method188(Class7.java:1160) at client.method142(client.java:10359) at client.method115(client.java:8660) at client.method62(client.java:2785) at client.method7(client.java:1852) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4249) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
idk how this happened it just did i was editing a model making it work not messing with anything but the models dat file then i went to see if my problem is fixed then i came across this dang error it is ver frustrating so if anyone can help please do it would help a ton....

item.title: 'thread 4' error
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

Umm - thread four means client froze…

Did you GZ the file? then add it?
